column4: configure: error: you need the GStreamer or the xine-lib development packages installed <<< I have libxine-dev though? Any ideas?
what are you trying to compile?
totem 1.2.0 using the sources from Gnome
get all dependencies by doing apt-get build-dep totem
maybe, even totem-xine :)
The only reason I'm not using the package is because I want TV out :)
isn't it in the repos?
version 38 is, but I need 39 to play online.
if u still want to compile it, apt-get build-dep scorched3d
the source is not available.
that just builds the dependencies
for building
I'm aware of that. E: Unable to find a source package for scorched3d
gimme a sec
paste.ubuntulinux.nl/3630
thanks!
nope, still get the error.
do you have that openal thing installed?
openal0 & openal-dev yes.
then either file a bug report on the openal package, with this error message. meanwhile, you might want to try compiling the openal package yourself
yeah, a compile or the source of openal (less than 30 seconds) fixed it!
cool, and not fun
